channel.title: Interface Text Lines [rep]
channel.description:
Hey everyone, trying to use a new interface for some text but I'm just not sure on how I need to go about finding the lines that the text is on (if that makes any sence..). The interface id is 359.
Sorry about such a short post (and sorry if it's confusing or not) but I'm just not sure on trying to find new lines for that interface like I said above, so if anyone can help me out or if you know of the lines for this interface.. Please feel free to reply on that. Also rep (for whatever it's worth).

item.title: Interface Text Lines [rep]
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Thanks guys, got it =).

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Text Lines [rep]
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

use a loop on login, to show all the interface text ids.

for(int i = 0; i < 2000; i++) 
   sendQuest(""+i, i);

or whatever the code is for sending a string to an interface.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Text Lines [rep]
item.dc:creator: @cmcmvj cmcmvj
item.description:
@cmcmvj wrote:

Parent: 359 Id: 360 “Line1”
Parent: 359 Id: 361 “Line2”
Parent: 359 Id: 362 “Click here to continue”

Read full topic
